encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

bibl.title: On the Meaning of porfÊra/porfÊrion in Greek Documentary Papyri. Avec résumés en allemand et en français. <porphura, porphurion>

series.title: Münstersche [puis: Marburger] Beiträge zur antiken Handelsgeschichte
MBAH

bibl.note: The attestations may be split up into three categories: attestations of porfÊra/porfÊrion = 'dye', attestations of porfÊra/porfÊrion = 'purple-colored wool', and attestations of porfÊra/porfÊrion allowing the meaning of both 'dye' and 'purple-colored wool'. <porphura, porphurion>
